es.project1: API para una web con Spring

en.intro: Hello! I'm Daniel Seregin Kozlov. During my COMMERCE DEGREE, although I didn't know exactly what I wanted to do, it was there when I discovered my true passion: programming. Realizing that it was what really motivated me, I decided to finish my COMMERCE DEGREE and then study MULTIPLATFORM APPICATION DEVELOPMENT, where I achieved an HONORIFIC MENTION for my final degree project. My main language is JAVA, but I also have experience with PYTHON and JAVASCRIPT, thanks to courses and self-learning. In addition, I have worked with SPRING and DJANGO, which allows me to create applications both in the BACKEND and in the FRONTEND. My motivation is to continue learning and face new challenges that allow me to grow as a programmer. I love solving real problems through efficient and scalable solutions. I always seek to improve my skills and explore new technologies that help me take my projects to the next level. Also, I speak fluently in 3 languages: ENGLISH, RUSSIAN and SPANISH, which allows me to work and communicate in different international environments. I am very motivated to continue developing as a programmer and contribute to projects that make a difference.
en.project1: API for a web with Spring
en.p1info: Together with a partner, we created a website for an NGO, my part of the project was the backend, the creation of the API.
en.p2info: The work of the end of the higher degree, an alternative to applications like MyAnimeList and MyAnimePlanet
en.p3info: Final project of a course offered by Harvard University on web programming with Python and JavaScript
en.p4info: Final project of databases, for the creation of a complete database of a center of vocational training
en.p5info: Program that organizes files in a certain way, while working with a database.
en.p6info: Working on new projects and improving day by day.
